name: Flower Shower (Eazy, pdfirefly, yoitserica, ASimpleFool)
description:
PLEASE TURN ON FULLSCREEN FOR THE PROPER EXPERIENCE!!!

Control water from hose and aim for the flower pot at the bottom to Water the Flower and watch it grow through each level!

  • Mouse - Aim hose
  • Left Click - Shoot the water from the hose
  • Right Arrow Key - Use the flipper (when available in levels)

Programming: Eazyyy & Pdfirefly

Art and UI: Yoitserica & ASimpleFool

Music and Audio (original): Pdfirefly
